name: Am I Lucky?
description:
Am I Lucky? is a short story of how one man handles a growing gambling addiction. This isn't meant to reflect everyone's experience to gambling, but more to give a story about someone who has fallen into the trap. We hope that through the dialogue and story of the game, the player gains a further understanding of how people think when they are addicted to gambling and why they spend the money that they do.

This game was produced for the University of Utah's Alternative Game Development course.

TEAM
Tanner Brown - Project Lead/Engineer
Scott Mattes - Designer/Engineer
Rane Brown - Artist
Holden Bott - Artist
Siddhee Kame - Engineer
